cmCourseInfo.description: The goal of this course is to critically explore debates and perspectives on development and on the politics of inequality in Latin American contexts. Topics of the course may vary, depending on the needs of the program and the interests of students and instructors.
cmCourseInfo.title: Topics in Latin American Studies

notes.name: Course Note
notes.content:
Delivery Instructions

This will be an intensive online hybrid course. Students will be expected to complete assignments asynchronously (estimate about 4 hours/week): readings, videos, exercises, writing, etc. during the first weeks of the course. The course will have one week of intensive mandatory online synchronous meetings, from Monday, May 31 to Friday, June 4 from 2:00 to 4:00 PM for presentations and discussions. Students will continue to work asynchronously for the last part of the course.
